CV

General information

  • Full name: Raphael de Freitas Saldanha

  • Date of birth: April 18, 1985

  • Languages: Portuguese, English

Education

  • 2022 - current. Postdoc at Inria and LNCC. Artificial intelligence applications on public health.

  • 2017 - 2021. PhD at Fiocruz, PPGICS. Information and Communication in Health.

  • 2015 - 2017. Graduate Degree (Master) at UFJF - PPGSC. Public Health.

  • 2008 - 2009. Specialization at UFJF. Computational Statistical Methods

  • 2003 - 2007. Undergraduate Degree at UFJF - ICHL-DG. Geography.
